column1: ntho ewela fatse kantle ka mona
tsamaya lere lebatla lehlaka le leleng la kwae
eya boabuti nka chelete ya lona ke ena he bana beso
ha ulla tjee he uetsa dintho tsempe kannete
oo ake ujwetse mami hle mmannyeo
fetela ka mona utlontlotsa le mami
ha kebatle hohlaha mane kele shwahle wena usabue
emong ke mang yahahileng pela mami
utlabua jwang ukentse letsoho ka hanong
ake ubale mami autlwe useule moholo useutseba hobala
ha usabona nkhono maphoka ntate makoso bomangwane wahao
